article.heading: Why you should visit Vindhyachal Temple from Varanasi?
paragraph: The Vindhyachal Temple, also known Maa Vindhyavasini Temple and Vindhyachal Dham, was dedicated to the mother godde Vindhyavasini, an embodiment of Shakti, it was one of the significant Shakti Pitha temples in India.
The legend goes that after vanquishing the demon Mahishasura, the goddess chose Vindhyachal as her abode. Her story was etched in the sacred scriptures of Durga Saptashati.
